title: Saint

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to enact the Hallow’s will upon, killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you have gained all required Saint points, you will transform into the Paragon. All players will be given the notification: “The Hallow has awakened their god…”
- Death of a Hallow member will revoke their Saint point and decrease the number of required Saint points for the you to transform by 1.
-  Gain a Saint point when you've killed two people.
- If you are dead, the Hallow will gain a factional kill ability.
